alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 11:20AM EDT until May 05 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schroon River At Riverbank. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water reaches minor flood stage with water in nearby lowlands and outbuildings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:01 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 6.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schroon River Riverbank Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Thu 11 am: 7.0 Forecast: Thu 2 pm 7.0 Thu 8 pm 7.0 Fri 2 am 7.0 Fri 8 am 6.9 Fri 2 pm 6.8 Fri 8 pm 6.7 Sat 2 am 6.6 Sat 8 am 6.5 Sat 2 pm 6.3 Sat 8 pm 6.2 Sun 2 am 6.1 Sun 8 am 6.0 &&
